SELECT j.*, GROUP_CONCAT(c.cert_nm SEPARATOR '/ ') AS certNm FROM jobs j JOIN job_cert_map jcm ON j.job_cd = jcm.job_cd JOIN cert c ON jcm.cert_id = c.cert_id
AND j.job_smcl_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{findText}, '%')
GROUP BY j.job_cd

SELECT j.*, GROUP_CONCAT(c.cert_nm SEPARATOR '/ ') AS certNm, GROUP_CONCAT(m.major_nm SEPARATOR '/ ') AS majorNm FROM jobs j JOIN job_cert_map jcm ON j.job_cd = jcm.job_cd JOIN cert c ON jcm.cert_id = c.cert_id JOIN job_major_map jmm ON j.job_cd = jmm.job_cd JOIN major m ON jmm.major_id = m.major_id WHERE j.job_cd = #{jobCd} GROUP BY j.job_cd
